answers.answer: Chalky or pail stool is a sing of liver problems,  You need to have this checked out.
It could also be from something you ate, or from a gallbladder problem.

Hi I was wondering something to..My mom has had the runs (dieahrea) for over 2 months know..at first they told her it was where she had her gallbladder removed several years ago..Know they are telling her it could be her diabetes..She has all kind of test & everything has came out normal but for some reason she cannot get rid of her diahrea..She goes no stop all day..She can't leave her home or anything..She is getting very weak from it..Her Dr. is sending her to a gastrologist to see what they think..I was wondering has anyone ever heard of anything like this before??
I have Diabetes too. Also the same problem. Its prob. the medication shes on. Hope it helps
Yes  it does thank-you very much...
